scene_description_enriched: A kneeling figure, likely a woman, with hands clasped in prayer and wearing a wimple and a pink cloak over a blue garment, faces a seated figure. The seated figure, depicted with a beard and a wide-brimmed hat, holds a book in one hand and a staff in the other. A green pouch hangs from their side. The background is a decorative pattern of alternating blue and red squares with gold dots. The scene is framed by an ornate, quatrefoil-shaped border in red, white, and blue.
